reference.shortdesc: Lists the previous state of each vBucket.

section.title: Description
section.p: This command lists the previous state of each vBucket.

section.title: Options
section.p: There are no options for this command. For common cbstats options, see .

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: cbstats localhost:11210 -u Administrator -p password -b beer-sample prev-vbucket
section.p: The output is quite lengthy, so this sample is truncated.
section.codeblock: vb_0: active vb_1: active vb_10: active vb_100: active vb_1000: active vb_1001: active vb_1002: active vb_1003: active vb_1004: active vb_1005: active vb_1006: active vb_1007:
